title: The 'Chandrika' Diamond Pendant: A Touch of Celestial Elegance
materials: Natural Round Brilliant Cut Diamonds (VVS Clarity
G Color). Featuring Hyderabadi Polish for exceptional luster.
features: Inspired by traditional Vanki armlet design, reimagined as a modern pendant. Features delicate, scalloped edges adorned with pave-set diamonds. The openwork design allows light to pass through, maximizing the brilliance of the diamonds. The piece showcases a balanced symmetry reflecting the timeless beauty of Indian craftsmanship.
colors: Yellow Gold and Sparkling White Diamonds
occasions: or any special occasion where a touch of understated elegance is desired. Suitable for both traditional Indian attire and contemporary Western outfits.
description: This 'Chandrika' pendant blends traditional Indian design motifs with modern sensibilities. The exceptional quality of the diamonds and the meticulous craftsmanship ensure a piece that will be treasured for generations. The pendant's versatile design makes it suitable for a variety of occasions, providing excellent value and timeless appeal.
